AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scuttle cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has always maintained that [PAWN_pronoun] invented scuttle, due to [PAWN_possessive] dislike of insect meat. Everyone around [PAWN_objective] knew it was a lie, but the scuttle was very tasty, so they feigned belief in [PAWN_nameDef] anyway.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms brewer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Brewers and Fishmongers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_pronoun] always questioned why the brewers and fishmongers had to share a hall, what with the constant smell of fish tainting the alcohol.
